card1.title: Full-Stack Developer
card1.description: Full-Stack Developer with experience in PHP/Laravel and SQL (MySQL/PostgreSQL). I work on creating and integrating RESTful APIs, optimizing queries for strategic reports, and developing scalable and secure web systems. I also build responsive interfaces prioritizing usability and accessibility.

card2.title: Public Health Experience
card2.description: Working on public health technology projects, developing systems and real-time strategic reports. Experience in data interoperability, Clean Code best practices, Git versioning, and agile methodologies.

monitora.title: Monitora Saúde
monitora.description: Web system for monitoring and evaluating health indicators and processes, providing updated data to support management, strategic planning, and health promotion in Maranhão.

hans.title: Hans+ App
hans.description: Hans+ is a platform with a web version and an Android app that supports leprosy treatment, allowing medication recording, symptom monitoring, and access to reliable information about the disease.

renaveh.title: RENAVEH
renaveh.description: Web-based system for patient registration, hospital notification management, and inter-hospital transfers, with an exclusive area for traffic accidents and access control based on roles and permissions.

masemfome.title: Maranhão Free from Hunger
masemfome.description: The Maranhão Free from Hunger system (health axis) combats food insecurity through the registration and follow-up of vulnerable families, enabling the recording of evaluations and monitoring the history of each individual.

cadserv.title: CadServ
cadserv.description: Registration and management system for SAPAPVS employees, allowing the recording of personal, functional, and social data, as well as managing information such as vacations, with access for managers, coordinators, and the deputy secretariat.

plandox.title: PlanDox 2.0
plandox.description: PlanDox 2.0 is the new version in development of a desktop software for experimental planning and biodiesel quality analysis, featuring an improved interface, mobile version, and microservices-based architecture.

react.title: REACT Portal
react.description: The REACT portal, under development, will be a platform for intuitive management of projects, news, public calls, and teams of the Science and Technology Application Network (REACT), strengthening academic and professional collaboration.

projectDdetails.projectNotFoundDescription: The project you are looking for does not exist or has been removed.

monitora.title: Monitora Saúde
monitora.description: Web system for monitoring and evaluating health indicators and processes, providing updated data to support management, strategic planning, and health promotion in Maranhão.
monitora.detailedDescription: Monitora Saúde is a web platform developed for the Maranhão State Health Department, aimed at modernizing and centralizing public health indicators monitoring. The system offers an intuitive interface for real-time data visualization and interactive dashboards that assist managers in strategic decision-making.
features: Interactive dashboards, built with Power BI, featuring real-time indicators
User management with different access levels

developmentProcess.title: Requirements Analysis
developmentProcess.description: Detailed assessment of Health Department needs and definition of priority indicators.

developmentProcess.title: System Architecture
developmentProcess.description: Development of MVC architecture using Laravel, focusing on scalability and performance.

developmentProcess.title: Backend Development
developmentProcess.description: Implementation of APIs, PostgreSQL integration, and development of indicator calculation algorithms.

developmentProcess.title: User Interface
developmentProcess.description: Creation of intuitive dashboards using modern data visualization technologies.

developmentProcess.title: Testing and Deployment
developmentProcess.description: Extensive testing and deployment in high-availability production environment.

hans.title: Hans+ App
hans.description: Hans+ is a platform with a web version and an Android app that supports leprosy treatment, allowing medication recording, symptom monitoring, and access to reliable information about the disease.
hans.detailedDescription: Hans+ is a mobile application developed to support leprosy treatment and provide reliable information about the disease. The project was carried out in partnership with the Pharmacy course at the Federal University of Maranhão (UFMA), with technical support and expertise in the health field. The application allows medication recording, daily symptom monitoring, and access to educational content. It uses Flutter for cross-platform development and Firebase for secure data storage. Hans+ went through stages of requirements gathering, prototyping, and usability testing, being evaluated as a practical, informative tool with great potential to assist patients in leprosy treatment monitoring.

developmentProcess.title: Research and Validation
developmentProcess.description: In-depth study on leprosy and proposal validation with specialized health professionals.

developmentProcess.title: UX/UI Design
developmentProcess.description: Creation of a friendly and accessible interface, considering different user profiles.

developmentProcess.title: Flutter Development
developmentProcess.description: Application implementation using Flutter to ensure native performance on Android and web.

developmentProcess.title: Firebase Integration
developmentProcess.description: Firebase backend configuration for authentication, database, and push notifications.

developmentProcess.title: User Testing
developmentProcess.description: Validation with real patients and health professionals for experience refinement.
